name: figma-files-raycast-extension
title: Figma File Search
description: Lists Figma files allowing you to search and navigate to them.
author: michaelschultz

preferences.name: PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN
preferences.title: Personal Access Token
preferences.description: [Deprecated] You can optionally use a personal access token to login, otherwise you will be prompted to login via the browser.

preferences.name: TEAM_ID
preferences.title: Team ID/s
preferences.description: Find this in the url after navigating to your team page. Add multiple Team IDs separated by a comma.

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Files
commands.subtitle: Figma
commands.description: Lists Figma files allowing you to search and navigate to them.

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Quicklook
commands.subtitle: Figma
commands.description: See your Figma most recent files at a glance

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
